item.description:
Join fellow Members of the South Shore Dining Out Meetup Group for a fun Thursday  Night Dinner @ Fat Cat  in Qunicy.  Yelp states the approximate cost for one meal including drink, tax and tip is approximately $11-$30.  The Fat Cat is a small restaurant located in Quincy Center which has received great reviews from practically everyone who has dined there. As this restaurant is small and does not accept reservations, this will be an "intimate" meetup and seating will be limited to members only.  The Fat Cat does not seat incomplete parties so if you don't mind arriving on time, waiting a few minutes (or up to 1/2 hr) to be seated, and meeting up with just a few members, this is the perfect event for you as we go to our 102nd "unique" restaurant.  ("Unique" meaning we have not eaten there before as a Group.)

This will be a great opportunity to meet and get to know each other, as well as talk about different foods, restaurants, and meals we enjoy. This will also be a great time to plan our next Dining Out event.

Please bring cash. You are responsible for your portion of the meal, including but not limited to, your drinks, food, tax, and tip and any shared items.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Dinner @ Fat Cat Restaurant
Thursday, February 24th, 2011 @ 5:30pm

24 Chestnut Street, Quincy, MA 02169

617-471-4363

www.fatcatrestaurant.com

Meeting Location: Outside the front door if it's nice out. We will then go in together as a Group. Otherwise, inside the Lobby. If you arrive after we are seated the reservation is under "Jeanne."

Organizer(s): Jeanne

Min/Max: Min of 6 people 48 hours in advance. Max of 8 people.

Guests: None.  This is a Members-Only event.

Fees: 2011 Annual Members - FREE, Group Members - $2; You may become a 2011 Annual Member for $12 at this event.

RSVP Deadline: 6:00PM on Wednesday, February 23rd. Any changes made after this time may not be seen by an Event Organizer and will be considered a No-Show per our guidelines on the About Us page. (It's not  OK to be late as all of the party must be there to be seated.


~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Directions:

The Directions will be posted

Parking: You will have to either park out side the restaurant if available.  Otherwise you will have to park in the community parking lot which is past the restaurant second right.
item.why: Members have been asking to go to the Fat Cat Restaurant for awhile now and it's a great restaurant for a small group outing, which some members have asked for recently.

group.name: The South Shore Dining Out Meetup Group

item.name: Thursday Evening Small Group Dinner at the Fat Cat
